citances.sentence: The dearth of material upon which the application was based, however, made it unnecessary for His Honour to discuss any generally expressed principle. See also: Datadot Technology Ltd v Alpha Microtech Pty Ltd [2003] FCA 1449. And in Australian Competition and Consumer Commission v Global Prepaid Communications Pty Ltd (In liq) [2008] FCA 874 an order was made that the costs payable by the third to sixth respondents be assessed as a gross sum. There was thereafter the intervening bankruptcy of two of the respondents. Notwithstanding the general proposition that " one cannot pursue a matter in court against the debtor once bankruptcy ensues " and that " the appropriate thing to do is to file a proof of debt ", Gyles J concluded that an order should be made pursuant to O 62 r 4(2)(c).

4 See also the comments of Sackville J in Seven Network Limited v News Limited [2007] FCA 2059 , Gyles J in Australian Competition and Consumer Commission v Global Prepaid Communications Pty Ltd (In Liq) [2008] FCA 874 at par [5] and Heerey J in Black & Decker Inc v Sunaone Pty Ltd [2008] FCA 1827 at par [4] .
